buckets.name: Agentic SDLC
buckets.description: Integration of agentic AI tools and practices into Software Development Life Cycle processes, including code generation, testing, and deployment automation.

buckets.name: People
buckets.description: Workforce readiness, training programs, and organizational change management for agentic AI adoption. Includes skills development and cultural transformation.

buckets.name: GRC
buckets.description: Governance, Risk, and Compliance frameworks for agentic AI. Includes policies, risk management, audit processes, and regulatory compliance measures.

buckets.name: Infrastructure
buckets.description: Technical infrastructure supporting agentic AI, including compute resources, data pipelines, model serving platforms, and monitoring systems.

buckets.name: Cross AI Initiatives
buckets.description: Cross-functional AI initiatives and collaborative projects that span multiple departments or business units, promoting knowledge sharing and best practices.

buckets.name: Management Engagement
buckets.description: Executive and management support for agentic AI initiatives. Includes leadership commitment, strategic alignment, and organizational sponsorship.
